member.name: T:C1.Blazor.TreeView.C1TreeView
member.summary: Represents a control that displays hierarchical data in a tree structure that has items that can expand and collapse.

member.name: P:C1.Blazor.TreeView.C1TreeView.Items
member.summary: Gets the collection of tree-view items. Every tree-view items contains the sub-items.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this allows drag-and-drop operations.

member.summary: Enables or disables the Keyboard navigation functionality of the C1TreeView.

member.summary: Gets or sets the selection behavior for a C1TreeView.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the node is collapsed when the users clicks in the C1TreeViewItem header.

member.summary: Gets or sets the treeview item has show checkbox or not.
